item.title: Beocord 5000 (4715/4716): Test Drive
item.description:
It’s a great day! My second Beocord 5000 (specifically models 4715/4716) is functional again and playing in sync with the rest of my setup: the Beomaster 6000 4-Channel and the Beogram 4002. To mark this occasion, I chose Sonny Rollins’ “Alfie” for the first recording. The movie “Alfie,” starring Michael Caine, is a personal favorite, and its soundtrack is incredible. Here are some snapshots from the listening session:..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beocord-5000-47154716-test-drive/

item.title: Beocord 5000 (4715/4716): Installing Rebuilt Rubber Pinch Rollers
item.description:
Thorough testing of the Beocord 5000 (4715/4716) tape deck revealed an occasional issue where the leading capstan would cease to move the tape forward. This occurred under specific conditions, particularly when humidity hovered around 60% and room temperature dipped below 65Â°F. As a result, the supply capstan would continue to push the tape forward, causing it to slip out of place between the erase head and the supply pinch roller. Fortunately, the Beocord’s auto-stop function activated quickly enough to prevent damage to the tape...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beocord-5000-47154716-installing-rebuilt-rubber-pinch-rollers/

item.title: An Early Christmas! Beosystem 6000 is in the House!
item.description:
Today, I took a 340-mile round trip to purchase a nearly perfect Beosystem 6000 from a fellow vintage audio enthusiast. It was a fantastic day! The Beogram 6000, complete with an MMC6000 cartridge, is in fantastic cosmetic shape. All the keypads look almost brand new, the veneer is in excellent condition, and it even includes replacement plexiglass components. It even came with all of the original owner’s manuals and service manuals, including the Beomaster 6000’s German “Technische Produktbeschreibung” (product description)!..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/an-early-christmas-beosystem-6000-is-in-the-house-/
